line1: Ooh, it was lovely. I lived in an eggshell.
line2: I was safe in there, dreaming of the life I would
line3: lead when I hatched, and the caverns I could rule.

line1: Then suddenly I felt a trembling of the ground,
line2: and my shell shattered.

line1: Through its cracks I saw the world for the first time,
line2: just in time to watch my sire die.

line1: It was a terrible shock for a newly hatched olmlet,
line2: but I try not to let it affect my mood.
line3: So what else shall we talk about, human?

line1: In ancient Judaism, the Priests (Kohanim) had a whole
line2: class of Levites as their assistants in maintaining the Temple.
line3: The Levites served by servants called Nethinim.
line4: These lowest level of servants were not priests.

line1: The Yoruba people of western Nigeria kept practicing an
line2: indigenous religion with a chiefly hierarchy of
line3: priests and priestesses that dates up to AD 800-1000!

line1: This ancient culture continues from time up to this day
line2: until today as it initiates from all around the world return to
line3: Nigeria for initiation into the traditional priesthood.

Okay! let's get started.
line2: Here is the @red@Shops area@bla@ where you can buy
line3: most of the items to start your adventure.

line1: This is the @blu@Voting points</col> exchange at Edgeville.
line2: In this shop you can get exchange your voting points
line3: for great rewards once you vote every 12 hours.
line4: Start voting by clicking on vote from your quest tab.

line1: This is the Skilling Store.
line2: In this shop you can buy items with skilling points
line3: You earn skilling points by earning skills experience
line4: such as training Farming or Thieving.

line1: Here is the @blu@Tzhaar Store</col>.
line2: Monsters near by drops 5-10 tokkul on average
line3: You can buy items with tokkul and trade it
line4: to other players, and can get you some nice cash rewards.

line1: This is the @blu@Experiments dungeon</col>.
line2: You can teleport here by talking to the @dre@Ancient wizard</col>
line3: in Edgeville that helps you move to any location
line4: on game. Exit the interface from top so we can proceed.

line1: This is the @blu@Slayer's cave</col>.
line2: You can get a Slayer task from @dre@Turael</col> west of
line3: Edgeville. You can find most of the Slayer monsters here.

line1: @blu@Catherby</col> is a common Skilling area here.
line2: Most players train their Fishing and Cooking skills here.
line3: You can also fish in the @blu@Fishing Guild</col>, or @blu@Karamja</col>.

line1: @blu@Neitznot city</col>, where you can train your Mining and Smithing.
line2: You can also find most of the Skilling shops you need
line3: to train your other skills south east of the area.

line1: The @blu@Duel arena</col> works perfectly with PID randomization.
line2: Stake and challenge other players over here.

line1: Here at the @blu@Fight caves</col> you can obtain
line2: a @dre@Firecape</col>, in two different ways by either
line3: defeating the mighty @dre@Tz-Tok-Jad</col> or you can slay
line4: @dre@Tzhaars</col> here for @dre@Tokkuls</col> to buy the cape.

line1: The only way to obtain defenders is through @blu@Warriors guild</col>.
line2: You have to slay @dre@Cyclops</col> to obtain @dre@Warrior</col>
line3: @dre@guild tokens</col> which can be exchanged with @dre@Kamfreena</col>.

line1: The @blu@Fun PvP area</col> is a unique place where players
line2: can fight each other and test their mutli @red@PVP
line3: skills without losing items upon death.

line1: You can speak the @dre@Gambler</col> to join the lottery.
line2: To start, you must purchase a ticket for 1M gp.
line3: the more tickets, the more odds of winning you have.
line4: The lottery is sorted out every 24 hours by our staff.

line1: Over here you can speak to @dre@Ashild</col> to obtain your
line2: @blu@Boss Contracts</col>. It costs 1.5M for a contract, and it assigns
line3: you a boss to slay within a short period of time. If you
line4: succeed you will receive a good cash prize.

line1: Here is the @dre@Kamil</col> boss, after finishing the tutorial
line2: you can right click the bosses to view their drop tables.
line3: @red@Every boss drops unique items which can only be obtained
line4: @red@from that particular boss.

line1: The famous @dre@King Black Dragon</col> can be slayed for
line2: its high rate of @dre@Dragonic visage</col> drop which can
line3: be used to create the @dre@Dragon Fire Shield</col>.
line4: @red@The superior 'Dragon whip' is uniquely dropped here.

line1: @dre@Scorpia</col> and its siblings is one of the challenging
line2: the Wilderness bosses in game, it can drop some rare items
line3: such as @dre@Ranger's tunic</col>, @dre@Robin hood hat</col>, and more.

line1: @dre@General Graardor</col> is from the Bandos army of the
line2: Godwars. You need 20 killcount before entering the
line3: chamber. It is known for the @dre@Bandos hilt</col> drop.

line1: You can't teleport directly to the @dre@Lava Dragons</col>.
line2: They are very tough and have a high rate of @dre@Dragonic visage</col>
line3: drop. However, the risk is that they are in deep the Wilderness.

line1: Here is the @dre@Ancient wyverns</col>, which can be found
line2: by teleporting to the @blu@Asgarnian dungeon</col> and
line3: then entering the Icy cavern entrance.

line1: The metal dragons are weak to magic spells and are
line2: great for quick experience. They can be found at the
line3: @blu@Brimhaven dungeon</col>. Bring an axe to cut the vines.
line4: There is also a small entrance fee upon getting there to enter.

line1: You can find many helpful links in your quest tab.
line2: There are also tasks to complete which offer generous rewards.
line3: You can also use the clan chat to seek help from players.

line1: This is the @blu@Home area</col>. The easiest way to
line2: get make money is by stealing from the stalls.

line1: Hello there.

What can I do with OSRS tokens?
line2: How can I exchange my tokens for OSRS GP?

line1: It is totally up to you with what you do with your tokens.
line2: You have the choice to trade them with other players or
line3: exchange them for OSRS GP!

line1: Good question, you can trade the token to any
line2: administrator staff and they will exchange it for you.
line3: However, five tokens are required at least for a trade.
line4: Trades are mostly carried and held every Tuesday.

line1: @dre@Black Knight Titan</col> is one of the unique
line2: bosses that we have with exclusive items. You must
line3: obtain a key to enter the dungeon found in @blu@Yanille</col>. The
line4: key can be found from slaying @dre@Dad</col> north of the city.

line1: The @dre@Alchemical Hydra</col> is one of the toughest
line2: bosses in-game. It is an instanced boss so
line3: you must be prepared with the strongest equipment
line4: to be able to slay the boss.

line1: The @dre@Mutant tarn</col> drops the @dre@Twisted bow</col> and
line2: known to have many different attack styles.
line3: It is best if you go there with a team of 3
line4: people at least to be able to slay the boss.

line1: The @dre@Adamant dragon</col> and @dre@Rune dragon</col> drops the
line2: @dre@Dragon's godsword</col> which is the strongest in-game.
line3: You can teleport there from your spell book as well.

line1: @blu@Ancient dungeon</col> has several slayer monsters to
line2: slay. It is quite useful area as it can fit many players.
